name: Kyung Hee University
description: As one of the top universities in Korea, Kyung Hee University not only offers a strong academic foundation, but reaches beyond that to promote its ideals far beyond the gates of the campus. The university, founded in 1949, has about 1,200 faculty members in three different campuses providing world-class education for about 23,000 undergraduate and graduate students. It has been encouraging frequent exchanges with sister schools overseas to facilitate the exchange of ideas. These activities spread a shared belief in the value of learning in this era of globalization.
